title: Intro to Analysis from f' part - b

content.description: The derivative of a function f is given by f'(x) = (x - 3)ex for x > 0, and f (1) = 7.
content.question: On what intervals, if any, is the graph of f both decreasing and concave up? Explain your reasoning.

frqParts.text: On what intervals, if any, is the graph of f both decreasing and concave up? Explain your reasoning.

skill.text: Skill 1.E: Apply appropriate mathematical rules or procedures, with and without technology.
